title: Grants senior citizens the option to renew motor vehicle registration for one year or two years
summary: Relates to coterminous consumer electronics warranties; ensures that consumer electronics warranties are meaningful to the extent that the duration of coverage on all parts are coterminous and warrantors must prove negligence on the part of the consumer before denying coverage.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing senior citizens to renew motor vehicle registrations annually
